name: Anyplace Reversi - Othello: black & white
description:
ANYPLACE REVERSI - the best way to kick your friend's ... in a smart way!
Tough combat on a REVERSI field!
From the guys that brought you ANYPLACE MAFIA, ANYPLACE POKER and ANYPLACE TIC TAC TOE!

- Awesome design in ANYPLACE MAFIA style!
- Develops your logic and strategic thinking!
- Competition and excitement!
- Friendly interface!
- Simple rules!
